Title: Eliminates nonprofit tax exemptions for entities engaged in political activity
Summary: Eliminates nonprofit tax exemptions for entities engaged in political activity.
LawCode: Add §27-a, amd §1116, Tax L; amd §§420-a & 420-b, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the real property tax law, in relation to eliminating nonprofit tax exemptions for entities engaged in political activity
